SENT.plain: Professor MA Rou has been engaged in clinical and basic research of hematology for more than 40 years
He is excel in the treatment of refractory hematological diseases under the guidance of holism and syndrome differentiation in Chinese medicine

Application of arsenic-containing Chinese herbal medicine in treating myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS), primary polycythemia vera (CMPD-PV), primary thrombocythemia (CMPD-ET), MDS-U, myeloproliferative disease, acute non lymphocytic leukemia except for promyelocytic leukemia, Prof
MA has made great innovation and exploration
For some diseases, he has obtained much mature experiences
Although some are still in the stage of exploration, ideal clinical effects has been shown primarily
